channel.title: Meshtastic on Wyzurd
channel.description: Recent content in Meshtastic on Wyzurd

item.title: Meshtastic
item.description:
The other day my good friend George Costakis brought up his interest in Meshtastic, a 915mhz comms network. Meshtastic had been floating around my periphary for a while, and the idea of joining a node network that could bridge my house to George’s sounded pretty cool. Queue my hyperfixation!

Hands On

At first I overnighted a heltec v3 just play with. It became very clear, almost immediatly, that the all in one kits for $20 are pretty much worthless without additional parts.
